title.value: Histology-informed automatic parcellation of white matter tracts in the rat spinal cord
title.justification: The title clearly outlines the focus of the study, which is histology-informed automatic parcellation of white matter tracts in the rat spinal cord.
title.quote: Nami H, Perone CS and Cohen-Adad J (2022) Histology-informed automatic parcellation of white matter tracts in the rat spinal cord.

extractions.description: This paper presents a study on utilizing histology-informed clustering for the automatic parcellation of white matter tracts in the rat spinal cord. It leverages metrics derived from scanning electron microscopy images and clustering algorithms to identify and differentiate individual white matter tracts, using AxonSeg for automatic axon segmentation.

type.justification: The study involves experimental procedures, including scanning electron microscopy and clustering algorithms, to process and analyze data, making it an empirical study.
type.quote: The objective of this study was to generate automatic parcellation of the rat spinal white matter tracts using the manifold information from scanning electron microscopy images of the entire spinal cord.

name.justification: The paper focuses on the anatomical study of the rat spinal cord's white matter tracts, aligning with the field of Neuroanatomy.
name.quote: The objective of this study was to generate automatic parcellation of the rat spinal white matter tracts using the manifold information from scanning electron microscopy images of the entire spinal cord.

name.justification: The study applied machine learning clustering methods to analyze the data and identify patterns within the spinal cord's white matter tracts.
name.quote: The parcellation was based on an agglomerative clustering algorithm to group the tracts.

name.justification: The paper describes using agglomerative clustering as a method to group white matter tracts based on morphometric data.
name.quote: The parcellation was based on an agglomerative clustering algorithm to group the tracts.

is_contributed.justification: The study utilizes a well-known existing algorithm (agglomerative clustering) rather than contributing a new model or algorithm.
is_contributed.quote: The parcellation was based on an agglomerative clustering algorithm to group the tracts.

is_executed.justification: Agglomerative clustering was used in the analysis as part of the study's methodologies.
is_executed.quote: The clustering of the morphometrics data was performed using scikit-learn’s agglomerative clustering algorithm.

is_compared.justification: There is no indication that the agglomerative clustering was compared with other models or methods within this study.
is_compared.quote: The parcellation was based on an agglomerative clustering algorithm to group the tracts.

referenced_paper_title.value: Introductory paper for hierarchical clustering methods
referenced_paper_title.justification: The specific reference to hierarchical or agglomerative clustering papers are not explicitly mentioned, but it is a well-established method.
referenced_paper_title.quote: The clustering of the morphometrics data was performed using scikit-learn’s agglomerative clustering algorithm.

name.justification: The Watson rat atlas was used as a reference for validating the clustering results in this study.
name.quote: The Watson et al. (2009) white matter atlas of the rat spinal cord was semi-manually digitized into discrete labels (one tract corresponding to a label) and right-left symmetrized.

referenced_paper_title.value: Atlas of the Rat Spinal Cord
referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced paper 'Atlas of the Rat Spinal Cord' correlates with the usage of the Watson atlas in this study.
referenced_paper_title.quote: The Watson et al. (2009) white matter atlas of the rat spinal cord was semi-manually digitized into discrete labels (one tract corresponding to a label) and right-left symmetrized.

name.justification: AxonSeg was used to perform axon segmentation in the study, which is crucial for the analysis pipeline.
name.quote: Stitched images were processed with AxonSeg (Zaimi et al., 2016) to generate masks of individual axons and myelin.

referenced_paper_title.value: AxonSeg: Open source software for axon and myelin segmentation and morphometric analysis
referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced paper outlines the development and use of AxonSeg for axon and myelin segmentation.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Stitched images were processed with AxonSeg (Zaimi et al., 2016) to generate masks of individual axons and myelin.

name.justification: The scikit-learn library was utilized for implementing the agglomerative clustering algorithm.
name.quote: The clustering of the morphometrics data was performed using scikit-learn’s agglomerative clustering algorithm.

referenced_paper_title.justification: Scikit-learn is a widely recognized library for machine learning in Python and is cited for its clustering capabilities.
referenced_paper_title.quote: The clustering of the morphometrics data was performed using scikit-learn’s agglomerative clustering algorithm.
